channel.title: Anonymous
channel.description: Can someone tell me exactly what these people are?

item.title: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

No recruitments and no requirements, Anonymous is not a clan. Its open to anyone and everyone that is willing to believe in what they believe. I would call myself a supporter and thats all

Read full topic

item.title: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

the elve age:

But is Anonymous a group of the same ideas? Do you need to be an excellent hacker for this group? This group is based off ideas, and ideas alone. There is no recruitment or requirements, so how is it that you have to be mature/smart to be in this group? You don’t.

There are multiple groups, and to get around with the ten.One you will need to be smart and mature.

Read full topic

item.title: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

But is Anonymous a group of the same ideas? Do you need to be an excellent hacker for this group? This group is based off ideas, and ideas alone. There is no recruitment or requirements, so how is it that you have to be mature/smart to be in this group? You don’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:16, topic:397500”]Why? Because you’re on Moparscape.

A true member of anonymous is one who has gone out and protested. I doubt any of you have gone to any Anon protests, nor have participated in web-based attacks. You all say you are “members”, but that is it. You don’t actually do anything.[/quote]
First, no one here has even said they are a member.
Second, just because we’re on other communities means we’re couldn’t be part of Anonymous. (Please tell me if part of the “Anonymous Guide” says that Anonymous members are not allowed to be part of other communities.)
And third, how do you know that nobody here has gone to protests? You don’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Michigan had a few local protests a couple.years ago, but on adverage there would only be 6-8 people at most

Read full topic

item.title: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Why? Because you’re on Moparscape.

A true member of anonymous is one who has gone out and protested. I doubt any of you have gone to any Anon protests, nor have participated in web-based attacks. You all say you are “members”, but that is it. You don’t actually do anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:14, topic:397500”][quote author=casey. link=topic=494644.msg3616496#msg3616496 date=1307027198]
It originally started off as a reference to the names imageboards would use(anonymous). When all the Scientology shit rolled around is when the name really stuck, because the Anon’s didn’t want Scientology to know their information. By using secret background as an image for their group, it has grown pretty much into two groups.

Trolls/morons who think/call themselves anonymous
Justice/mature/protest anonymous

No one on this site is a true member if anonymous at that either, so don’t try to act like you are.

[/quote]
And how would you know? The whole idea is that they’re anonymous. So you wouldn’t know if someone is a member, would you?[/quote]
^ This

Also, may I point out, Anonymous members don’t do these things for attention, they don’t care if you know your a member of this ideal system. They don’t do things for glory, they do them because its the right thing to do. Also if any member were to say they were one would be completely stupid because there are many laws that are broken in the process of attacks on sites and servers that can be constricted at a federal level. Plus I don’t know many 15 year olds (not being directed to anyone here) that can preform the tasks needed for the hacking side of their operations.

Read full topic

item.title: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:9, topic:397500”]This is not a “hacking clan” or what ever you guys may say. Anonymous supports the freedom of speech and acts in ways to make sure that the freedom to information and idea’s is always a freedom. They do not hack for any monetary gain but to keep the world just. No personal victims have every come from Anonymous as they do not attack people to steal their identity or anything like that. I for one support them and the idea’s that the world is changing and freedoms are being taken and we need to stop it before its too late. Also, Anonymous is not a community, the members of it do no all talk to each other freely, there is no recruitment and there are no sites. It is the coming together of people with the same morals and sense of right and wrong, anyone can join at anytime as long as you believe in its ideals.


Noi nu uita, nu ne iartă, ne aşteaptă.[/quote]
At least somebody knows what the fuck they’re talking about.

Read full topic

item.title: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“whip of soulz, post:10, topic:397500”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=494644.msg3616443#msg3616443 date=1307022447]
This is not a “hacking clan” or what ever you guys may say. Anonymous supports the freedom of speech and acts in ways to make sure that the freedom to information and idea’s is always a freedom. They do not hack for any monetary gain but to keep the world just. No personal victims have every come from Anonymous as they do not attack people to steal their identity or anything like that. I for one support them and the idea’s that the world is changing and freedoms are being taken and we need to stop it before its too late. Also, Anonymous is not a community, the members of it do no all talk to each other freely, there is no recruitment and there are no sites. It is the coming together of people with the same morals and sense of right and wrong, anyone can join at anytime as long as you believe in its ideals.


Noi nu uita, nu ne iartă, ne aşteaptă.

[/quote]
This is why anon sucks now, it used to be about teh lulz.[/quote]
You clearly never knew what Anonymous was then. It was never “about teh lulz” some of the active people in it may have been like that before it was started but Anonymous has never done anything “for teh lulz”.

Read full topic
